title: How to unsubscribe from YouTube Premium
description: You can cancel your YouTube Premium membership through the YouTube website or app, or through Google Play if you signed up that way. Follow these steps to cancel your subscription.

web.title: Cancel YouTube Premium via Website
web.description:
To cancel your YouTube Premium subscription via the website:

*   Go to the YouTube website and click your profile icon.
*   Select "Purchases and memberships" from the dropdown menu.
*   Click "Manage membership".
*   Click "Deactivate" and then "Continue".
*   Choose a reason for cancellation and click "Next".
*   Confirm by clicking "Yes, cancel".

app.title: Cancel YouTube Premium via Android App
app.description:
To cancel your YouTube Premium subscription via the Android app:

*   Launch the YouTube app on your Android device.
*   Tap your profile icon, then the gear icon.
*   Select Purchases and memberships.
*   Tap the subscription you wish to cancel.
*   Tap Cancel, then Continue.
*   Provide a cancellation reason.
*   Confirm by tapping Cancel Premium.

seo_text: Cancel YouTube Premium subscription. Steps to unsubscribe from YouTube Premium on website, Android app, and Google Play.
